display_name: Short UPPS-P Impulsive Behavior Scale: When I am in a great mood, I tend to get into situations that could cause me problems
description:
Item from the Short UPPS-P Impulsive Behavior Scale with a range of 1 (Strongly Agree) to 4 (Strongly Disagree). Coded so higher scores indicate less impulsivity. [Cyders et al 2014 (PMID: 24636739)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4055534/)

Question text: For each statement, please indicate how much you agree or disagree with the statement.
